name: part_008
file: tmp_真夏のReGLOSSカラオケ！〜新曲披露もあるよ〜【#真夏のReGLOSS】 [DiHB5voNt00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section where the members discuss their next song. Kanade and Raden decide to sing a slower song to 'cool down' after the previous high-energy tracks.
Performance of the song 'Planetarium' by Ai Otsuka, performed as a duet by Kanade and Raden.

subtitles.original: 奏とらでんの番なんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Isn't it Kanade and Raden's turn?

subtitles.original: えー？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: いいじゃん。
subtitles.english: Good idea.

subtitles.original: ちょっとこう、結構ね、ヒートアップしちゃったから。
subtitles.english: I've gotten a bit heated up, you see.

subtitles.original: 一旦クールダウンしようかね。
subtitles.english: Let's cool down for a moment.

subtitles.original: クールダウン？
subtitles.english: Cool down?

subtitles.original: らでんの体力も持ちませんから。
subtitles.english: My stamina won't hold out otherwise.

subtitles.original: ちょっとゆっくりした曲をね。はい。
subtitles.english: So, a bit of a slower song. Yes.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあ二人とも準備してくださいね。
subtitles.english: Alright, then both of you please get ready.

subtitles.original: はーい。
subtitles.english: Oka-y.

subtitles.original: よいしょ。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho.

subtitles.original: 準備いいですか？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: はい。それじゃあ…
subtitles.english: Yes. Well then...

subtitles.original: あれ？座って歌う？
subtitles.english: Wait, are we singing sitting down?

subtitles.original: いや、立つ。
subtitles.english: No, we stand.

subtitles.original: あ、立ってるかな？立ってるわ。
subtitles.english: Ah, are we standing? We're standing.

subtitles.original: 立ったー！
subtitles.english: We stood up!

subtitles.original: 心も踊ってきた。
subtitles.english: My heart's starting to dance too.

subtitles.original: では、音楽お願いします。
subtitles.english: Now then, music please.

subtitles.original: 踊っちゃだめよ。
subtitles.english: Don't dance, okay?

subtitles.original: 後だった。
subtitles.english: That was for afterwards.

subtitles.original:
プラネタリウム
愛　詞・曲
subtitles.english:
Planetarium
Lyrics & Music by Ai

subtitles.original: 夕月夜 顔だす
subtitles.english: The evening moon peeks out

subtitles.original: 消えてく子供の声
subtitles.english: Fading voices of children

subtitles.original: 遠く遠くこの空のどこかに
subtitles.english: Far, far away, somewhere in this sky

subtitles.original: 君はいるんだろう
subtitles.english: I'm sure you are there

subtitles.original: 夏の終わりに 二人で抜け出した
subtitles.english: At the end of summer, we slipped away together

subtitles.original: この公園で見つけた
subtitles.english: We found it in this park

subtitles.original: あの星座 何だか覚えてる？
subtitles.english: Do you remember that constellation?

subtitles.original: 会えなくても 記憶をたどって
subtitles.english: Even if we can't meet, I trace my memories

subtitles.original: 同じ幸せを見たいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to see the same happiness

subtitles.original: あの香りとともに
subtitles.english: Along with that scent

subtitles.original: 花火がぱっと開く
subtitles.english: Fireworks suddenly burst open

subtitles.original: 行きたいよ 君のところへ
subtitles.english: I want to go to where you are

subtitles.original: 今すぐ かけだして 行きたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to run to you right now

subtitles.original: まっ暗で 何も見えない
subtitles.english: It's pitch black and I can't see anything

subtitles.original: 怖くても 大丈夫
subtitles.english: But even if I'm scared, it's okay

subtitles.original: 数えきれない 星空が
subtitles.english: The countless stars in the sky

subtitles.original: 今もずっと ここにあるんだよ
subtitles.english: They are still right here, even now

subtitles.original: 泣かないよ 昔 君と見た
subtitles.english: I won't cry, because it was a beautiful sky...

subtitles.original: きれいな空だったから
subtitles.english: ...that I saw with you long ago

subtitles.original: あの道まで 響く
subtitles.english: Resonating all the way to that road

subtitles.original: 靴の音が耳に残る
subtitles.english: The sound of footsteps lingers in my ears

subtitles.original: 大きな自分の影を
subtitles.english: Looking at my own large shadow

subtitles.original: 見つめて想うのでしょう
subtitles.english: I suppose you're thinking

subtitles.original: ちっとも変わらないはずなのに
subtitles.english: Even though nothing should have changed

subtitles.original: せつない気持ち ふくらんでく
subtitles.english: This painful feeling keeps growing

subtitles.original: どんなに想ったって
subtitles.english: No matter how much I think of you

subtitles.original: 君はもういない
subtitles.english: You are no longer here

subtitles.original: 行きたいよ 君のそばに
subtitles.english: I want to go to your side

subtitles.original: 小さくても 小さくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's just a little, just a little

subtitles.original: １番に君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: I love you more than anyone else

subtitles.original: 強くいられる
subtitles.english: I can stay strong

subtitles.original: 願いを 流れ星に
subtitles.english: To the shooting star

subtitles.original: そっと 唱えてみたけれど
subtitles.english: I softly whispered my wish

subtitles.original: 泣かないよ 届くだろう
subtitles.english: I won't cry, surely it will reach

subtitles.original: きれいな空に
subtitles.english: The beautiful sky

subtitles.original: 会えなくても 記憶をたどって
subtitles.english: Even if we can't meet, I trace my memories

subtitles.original: 同じ幸せを見たいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to see the same happiness

subtitles.original: あの香りとともに
subtitles.english: Along with that scent

subtitles.original: 花火がぱっと開く
subtitles.english: Fireworks suddenly burst open

subtitles.original: 行きたいよ 君のところへ
subtitles.english: I want to go to where you are

subtitles.original: 小さな手を にぎりしめて
subtitles.english: Clasping my small hands tight

subtitles.original: 泣きたいよ それはそれは
subtitles.english: I want to cry, it was such a

subtitles.original: きれいな空だった
subtitles.english: beautiful sky

subtitles.original: 願いを 流れ星に
subtitles.english: To the shooting star

subtitles.original: そっと 唱えてみたけれど...
subtitles.english: I softly whispered my wish...
